title: Numbers Undercover Vintage Children Game (XP and older)
description:
Numbers Undercover K-3 Sunburst Software

I was not able to run this game under Windows XP due to an old version of Quicktime that was needed to be installed. I was able to run it under compatability mode with Windows 2000 and ignoring the Quicktime installer when it asked to scan the system for other versions of Quicktime. You may need to uninstall the newer version of Quicktime to get it to work.


Minimum Requirements:

Windows - Win 3.1, 95. 98, NT/2000
8 MB of RAM (16 MB RAM recommended)
66mhz processor
640x380 screen resolution
20 MB hard disk space
Must run in 256 color

Macintosh - Same as Windows except:
System 7.0 or higher
68040 processor or better
